You can create a [link to another webpage](https://aws.amazon.com/).",
  "schemaVersion" : "0.3",
  "mainSteps" : [ {
    "name" : "S3download",
    "action" : "aws:executeScript",
    "inputs" : {
      "Runtime" : "python3.6",
      "Handler" : "download_s3_file",
      "Script" : "import boto3
BUCKET_NAME = 'cfntestford'
BUCKET_FILE_NAME = 'banner.sh'
LOCAL_FILE_NAME = '/tmp/banner.sh'

def download_s3_file(events, context):
    s3 = boto3.client('s3')
    s3.download_file(BUCKET_NAME, BUCKET_FILE_NAME, LOCAL_FILE_NAME)"
    },
    "description" : "Download the script from S3"
  } ]
}
